resultsError: Results could not be calculated. This is often due to a misconfigured strategy or an unresponsive RPC node involved in the strategy.
vpError: Your voting power could not be calculated. This is often due to a misconfigured strategy or an unresponsive RPC node involved in the strategy.
author: Author
warningSpace: This is not an official space, proceed with caution!
demoSite: This is the demo site, give it a try!
confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove your delegation to
notificationsNotSupported: Your browser does not support notifications
twoChoicesRequired: Two choices are required for this plugin.
noResultsFound: Oops, we can't find any results
noSpacesJoined: Oops, you haven't joined any spaces yet
mustAgreeToTerms: Before you can complete this action, you must agree to {0} terms of service here:
networkErrorPlayground: Network error - please open your browser console for more information
setDelegationToSpace: Limit delegation to a specific space

newSpaceNotice.mainText: You can change how voting power is calculated via strategies in your {settings}. Changes to your settings will only affect new proposals, existing proposals can not be changed.
newSpaceNotice.learnMore: Learn more in the {documentation} or join Snapshot {discord} for help.

errors.minStrategy: At least one strategy is required.
errors.website: URL should be in the format https://www.example.com
errors.unsupportedImageType: File type not supported, Supported formats are jpeg, jpg and png

create.delayEnforced: The space enforces a delay until voting can start
create.periodEnforced: The space enforces the duration of the voting period
create.votingPeriodExplainer: This is the time period in which users will be able to vote. The proposal will be visible and pending before the start of the voting period.
create.uploadImageExplainer: Attach images by dragging & dropping, selecting or pasting them.

basic.member: You need to be an author of the space in order to submit a proposal.
basic.minScore: You need to have a minimum of {0} {1} in order to submit a proposal.

validationWarning.customValidation: You need to pass the proposal validation in order to submit a proposal.
validationWarning.executionError: Verifying your eligibility to create proposals in this space has failed. This is likely due to a misconfigured strategy.

delegate.pendingTransaction: no pending transaction | 1 pending transaction | {count} pending transactions
delegate.delegateToSelfAddress: You cannot delegate to your own ENS address
delegate.noDelegationsAndDelegates: Can't find your delegations and delegates? Make sure you are connected to the correct network.
delegate.delegateNotSupported: Delegation is currently not supported for {network}.

proposals.noProposals: There aren't any proposals here yet!

settings.connectWithSpaceOwner: To modify space settings, connect with a controller or admin wallet.
settings.noRecord: No text-record found. Make sure you have registered {id} domain on {network}, then edit the controller text-record to regain access to the space settings.

terms.label: Terms
terms.information: Users will be required to accept these terms once before they can create a proposal or cast a vote.

subspaces.label: Sub-spaces
subspaces.information: Sub-spaces will only be shown once configured on both the main space and the sub-space(s). {docs}

parent.label: Main space
parent.information: The space that this space is a sub-space of will be displayed on the space page

children.label: Sub-spaces
children.information: Related sub-spaces listed here will be displayed on the space page

strategies.label: Voting strategy
strategies.information: Strategies are used to determine voting power or whether a user is eligible to create a proposal.

network.label: Network
network.information: The defaul network used for this space. Networks can also be specified in individual strategies.

symbol.label: Symbol
symbol.information: The default symbol used for this space, usually the token symbol i.e. BAL for Balancer.

admins.label: Admins
admins.information: Admins are able to modify the space settings and manage the space's proposals.

authors.label: Authors
authors.information: Authors are able to create proposals without having to pass validation.

proposalThreshold.label: Proposal threshold
proposalThreshold.information: The minimum amount of voting power required to create a proposal.

settings.allowOnlyAuthors: Allow only authors to submit a proposal

quorum.label: Quorum
quorum.information: The minimum amount of voting power required for the proposal to pass.

type.label: Type
type.information: The type of voting system used for this space. This will enforce the same voting system for all proposals.

settings.hideAbstain: Ignore abstain votes in basic voting results

domain.label: Domain name
domain.info: To setup a custom domain you additionally need to open a pull request on github after you have created the space. {docs}

treasuries.label: Treasuries
treasuries.information: Add treasuries of your organization to show them in your space.

setup.chooseExistingEns: Choose one of your existing ENS domains to create a space with:
setup.demoTestnetEnsMessage: To create a test space you need an ENS domain on {network}.
setup.toCreateASpace: To create a space, you first need an ENS domain. Enter one below and follow the ENS registration instructions.
setup.helpDocsAndDiscordLinks: Not sure how to setup your space? Learn more in the {docs} or join Snapshot {discord}.
setup.setSpaceControllerExists: The snapshot text-record for this domain has already been set. Choose edit to change it, otherwise you can skip to the next step.
setup.setSpaceControllerInfo: The space controller is the account that will be able to manage the space settings. Additional space controllers (admins) can be added later.
setup.setSpaceControllerInfoGnosisSafe: When creating a space with a Gnosis Safe it's recommended to set the safe address as the space controller. If you don't, you need to follow some additional steps. {link}
setup.explainControllerAndEns: Setting the controller requires a transaction on the {network} which will add a "snapshot" TEXT record to your ENS domain.
setup.confirmToSetAddress: Are you sure you want to set {address} as the controller of the space?
setup.controllerHasAuthority: The controller has full authority over the space settings
setup.waitForTransaction: The transaction need to confirm before you can create your space. {txUrl}
setup.pleaseWaitMessage: This can take a few minutes, please wait while the transaction is being confirmed
setup.notControllerAddress: Please connect with the controller address {wallet} to create the space.

domain.title: Setup your space domain
domain.ensMessage: One thing you need before you can create your own space, is an ENS domain on Ethereum mainnet.
domain.ensMessageTestnet: You can also {link} on the Rinkeby testnet and mess with things there first.

strategy.title: How would you like to setup your voting strategy?
strategy.subtitle: You can change your strategy settings any time.

onePersonOneVote.title: One person, one vote
onePersonOneVote.description: Manage a whitelist of people who can vote or simply allow any address to vote. Every vote is equal and no token is required
onePersonOneVote.whitelistInformation: Specify a number of accounts that can vote
onePersonOneVote.votesEqualInfo: Each vote is equal and no token is required

tokenVoting.title: Token weighted voting
tokenVoting.description: Votes are weighted by a token. The token can be an ERC-20, ERC-721 or ERC-1155 token standard

advanced.title: Custom setup
advanced.description: Select up to 8 strategies with a wide range of options. If you can't find the right strategy for your use case, you can create your own

setup.validationTitle: Who can manage this space and create proposals?

about.delegatorNetworkInfo: Change by switching network in your wallet

notify.ensSet: ENS text record was successfully set

description.single-choice: Each voter may select only one choice.
description.approval: Each voter may select any number of choices.
description.quadratic: Each voter may spread voting power across any number of choices. Results are calculated quadratically.
description.ranked-choice: Each voter may select and rank any number of choices. Results are calculated by instant-runoff counting method.
description.weighted: Each voter may spread voting power across any number of choices.
description.basic: Single choice voting with three choices: For, Against or Abstain

labels.connectWallet: Connect wallet to see execution details
labels.switchChain: Switch your wallet to {0} to request execution
labels.question: Did this proposal pass and does it meet the

poap.no_poap_header: A POAP hasn't been setup for this proposal yet :'(
poap.claimed_header: Congratulations! The POAP has been minted to your collection
poap.loading_header: The POAP is being minted to your collection
poap.success_claim: The POAP has been minted to your collection
poap.error_claim: There was a problem minting the token

charts.noVotesYet: There are no votes to visualize yet.

comment_box.title: Comment box
comment_box.edit_modal: Are you sure you want to edit?
comment_box.delete_modal: Are you sure you want to delete?

hal.title: Track proposals for {spaceName}
hal.text: Receive notifications every time a new proposal is created or ends

unsupportedNetwork.switchNetworkToNetwork: To continue, you need to change the network in your wallet to {network}.

wallets.title: Wallets
wallets.empty: This space doesn't have a treasury yet

assets.title: Assets
assets.empty: There are no assets in this contract

header.title: Where decisions get made
header.description: Snapshot is a free, open-source platform for community governance. Create your own space now and start making decisions!

aboutPage.description: Snapshot is a decentralized governance platform that makes it easy to create and vote on proposals - all without spending a fortune on gas fees! Plus, our flexible system supports various voting types and strategies, so you can tailor the voting process to your needs.
aboutPage.subDescription: Web3 governance doesn't have to be complicated. Snapshot is the perfect solution for organizations looking for an easy and efficient way to govern their community or organization.
